title: Support/Resistance & swing structure
description: Turn swing points into meaningful support/resistance zones. BOS/CHOCH basics with anchored confluence.

title: ATR & volatility (position sizing glue)
description: Quantify volatility with ATR and convert it into hard numbers for stops and position size. Worked examples + edge cases.

title: Risk 101: R-multiple, stop types, win% vs. expectancy
description: Build a risk language: R, expectancy, stop styles, and sequence risk. Includes math and practical guardrails.

title: Orders & execution (limit/market/stop, partials)
description: How market/limit/stop orders actually fill, smart use of partials, and the slippage math that matters.

title: Multi-TF alignment & HTF veto
description: Use higher timeframes to set weather and veto local ideas. Practical alignment rules that reduce whipsaw.

title: Range anatomy: mid, acceptance, failed breakouts
description: Understand mid, acceptance, and failed breakouts to stop chasing ghosts. Targets that make sense.
